verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, saying unto <S%H559>them<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H2063>These<s%> are the living <S%H2416>things<s%> which ye may <S%H398>eat<s%> among all the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that are on the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
Whatsoever <S%H6536>parteth<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>, and is <S%H8156>clovenfooted<s%>, and <S%H5927>cheweth<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, among the <S%H929>beasts<s%>, that may ye <S%H398>eat<s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> these shall ye not <S%H398>eat<s%> of them that <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, or of them that <S%H6536>part<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>: the <S%H1581>camel<s%>, because he <S%H5927>cheweth<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%> but <S%H6536>parteth<s%> not the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>, he is unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.
And the <S%H8227>coney<s%>, because he <S%H5927>cheweth<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%> but <S%H6536>parteth<s%> not the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>, he is unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.
And the <S%H768>hare<s%>, because she <S%H5927>cheweth<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%> but <S%H6536>parteth<s%> not the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>, she is unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.

And the <S%H2386>swine<s%>, because he <S%H6536>parteth<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>, and is <S%H8156>clovenfooted<s%>, but <S%H1641>cheweth<s%> not the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, he is unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.
Of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> ye shall not <S%H398>eat<s%>, and their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> ye shall not <S%H5060>touch<s%>; they are unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.

These may ye <S%H398>eat<s%> of all that are in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>: whatsoever hath <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, in the <S%H3220>seas<s%>, and in the <S%H5158>rivers<s%>, that may ye <S%H398>eat<s%>.

And all that have not <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas<s%>, and in the <S%H5158>rivers<s%>, of all that <S%H8318>move<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and of all the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creatures<s%> that are in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, they are an abomination unto <S%H8263>you<s%>,
and they shall be an <S%H8263>abomination<s%> unto <S%H398>you<s%>; ye shall not eat of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> ye shall have in <S%H8262>abomination<s%>.
Whatsoever hath no <S%H5579>fins<s%> nor <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, that is an abomination unto <S%H8263>you<s%>.

And these ye shall have in <S%H8262>abomination<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H5775>birds<s%>; they shall not be <S%H398>eaten<s%>, they are an <S%H8263>abomination<s%>: the <S%H5404>eagle<s%>, and the <S%H6538>gier-eagle<s%>, and the <S%H5822>ospray<s%>,
and the <S%H344>kite<s%>, and the <S%H344>falcon<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind<s%>,
every <S%H6158>raven<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind<s%>,
and the <S%H1323>ostrich<s%>, and the <S%H8464>night-hawk<s%>, and the <S%H7828>sea-mew<s%>, and the <S%H8464>hawk<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind<s%>,
and the little <S%H3563>owl<s%>, and the <S%H7994>cormorant<s%>, and the great <S%H3244>owl<s%>,
and the horned <S%H8580>owl<s%>, and the <S%H6893>pelican<s%>, and the <S%H7360>vulture<s%>,
and the <S%H2624>stork<s%>, the <S%H601>heron<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and the <S%H1744>hoopoe<s%>, and the <S%H5847>bat<s%>.
All <S%H5775>winged<s%> <S%H8318>creeping<s%> things that <S%H1980>go<s%> upon all <S%H702>fours<s%> are an abomination unto <S%H8263>you<s%>.

Yet these may ye <S%H398>eat<s%> of all <S%H5775>winged<s%> <S%H8318>creeping<s%> things that <S%H1980>go<s%> upon all <S%H702>fours<s%>, which have <S%H3767>legs<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%>, <S%H2004>wherewith<s%> to <S%H5425>leap<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Even these of them ye may <S%H398>eat<s%>: the <S%H697>locust<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and the bald <S%H5556>locust<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and the <S%H2728>cricket<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and the <S%H2284>grasshopper<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind<s%>.
But all <S%H5775>winged<s%> creeping <S%H8318>things<s%>, which have <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%>, are an abomination unto <S%H8263>you<s%>.
And by these ye shall become <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: whosoever <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of them shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>;
And whosoever <S%H5375>beareth<s%> aught of the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of them shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

Every <S%H929>beast<s%> which <S%H6536>parteth<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>, and is not <S%H8157>clovenfooted<s%>, nor <S%H5927>cheweth<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto <S%H5060>you<s%>: every one that toucheth them shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.

And <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H1980>goeth<s%> upon its <S%H3709>paws<s%>, among all <S%H2416>beasts<s%> that <S%H1980>go<s%> on all <S%H702>fours<s%>, they are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto <S%H5060>you<s%>: whoso toucheth their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And he that <S%H5375>beareth<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of them shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>: they are unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.

And these are they which are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you among the creeping <S%H8318>things<s%> that <S%H8317>creep<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>: the <S%H2467>weasel<s%>, and the <S%H5909>mouse<s%>, and the great <S%H6632>lizard<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind<s%>,
and the <S%H604>gecko<s%>, and the <S%H3581>land-crocodile<s%>, and the <S%H3911>lizard<s%>, and the <S%H2546>sand-lizard<s%>, and the <S%H8580>chameleon<s%>.

These are they which are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you among all that <S%H8318>creep<s%>: whosoever doth <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H4194>them<s%>, when they are dead, shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And upon whatsoever any of <S%H4194>them<s%>, when they are dead, doth <S%H5307>fall<s%>, it shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>; whether it be any <S%H3627>vessel<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%>, or <S%H899>raiment<s%>, or <S%H5785>skin<s%>, or <S%H8242>sack<s%>, whatsoever <S%H3627>vessel<s%> it <S%H4399>be<s%>, wherewith any work is <S%H6213>done<s%>, it must be <S%H935>put<s%> into <S%H4325>water<s%>, and it shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>; then shall it be clean.
And every <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>, whereinto any of them <S%H5307>falleth<s%>, whatsoever is in it shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>, and it ye shall <S%H7665>break<s%>.

All <S%H400>food<s%> therein which may be <S%H398>eaten<s%>, that on which <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>, shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>; and all <S%H4945>drink<s%> that may be <S%H8354>drunk<s%> in every such <S%H3627>vessel<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.

And every thing whereupon any part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>falleth<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>; whether <S%H8574>oven<s%>, or range for <S%H2931>pots<s%>, it shall be broken in pieces: they are unclean, and shall be unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.

Nevertheless a <S%H4599>fountain<s%> or a <S%H953>pit<s%> wherein is a gathering of <S%H4325>water<s%> shall be <S%H2889>clean<s%>: but that which <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.
And if aught of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon any <S%H2221>sowing<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> which is to be <S%H2232>sown<s%>, it is <S%H2889>clean<s%>.
But if <S%H4325>water<s%> be <S%H5414>put<s%> upon the <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and aught of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H2931>thereon<s%>, it is unclean unto you.

And if any <S%H929>beast<s%>, of which ye may <S%H402>eat<s%>, <S%H4191>die<s%>; he that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> thereof shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And he that <S%H398>eateth<s%> of the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of it shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>: he also that <S%H5375>beareth<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of it shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.
And every creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H8317>creepeth<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> is an <S%H8263>abomination<s%>; it shall not be <S%H398>eaten<s%>.

Whatsoever <S%H1980>goeth<s%> upon the <S%H1512>belly<s%>, and whatsoever <S%H1980>goeth<s%> upon all <S%H702>fours<s%>, or whatsoever hath many <S%H7272>feet<s%>, even all creeping <S%H8318>things<s%> that <S%H8317>creep<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>, them ye shall not <S%H398>eat<s%>; for they are an <S%H8263>abomination<s%>.

Ye shall not <S%H8262>make<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> <S%H8262>abominable<s%> with any creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H8317>creepeth<s%>, neither shall ye make yourselves <S%H2933>unclean<s%> with <S%H2930>them<s%>, that ye should be defiled thereby.

For I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: sanctify <S%H6942>yourselves<s%> <S%H6918>therefore<s%>, and be ye holy; for I am holy: neither shall ye <S%H2930>defile<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> with any manner of creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that moveth upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

For I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to be your <S%H430>God<s%>: ye shall therefore be <S%H6918>holy<s%>, for I am <S%H6918>holy<s%>.

This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H929>beast<s%>, and of the <S%H5775>bird<s%>, and of every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H7430>moveth<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and of every <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H8317>creepeth<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>;

to make a <S%H914>distinction<s%> between the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%>, and between the living <S%H2416>thing<s%> that may be <S%H398>eaten<s%> and the living <S%H2416>thing<s%> that may not be <S%H398>eaten<s%>.
